original_title: 三代目襲名：沙羅　濡れそぼる背に踊る愛欲の夜叉
overview: Sara spends peaceful days as an OL of a first-class company, but her life is turned upside down and she ends up in a fierce conflict, fighting off the dirty desires of the men from the underbelly of society!
title: Third Generation Successor Sara: Lustful Nightshade
